short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Estimates the number of words read across while browsing the web and approximates how many books it would be.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever wonder how many words you read a day while online? This extension estimates the number of words that you read while you are on a tab and then calculates how many books it would equal. Find out how many words do you read online a day, week, month, or even year!
